titles.title: A bill to amend the Water Resources Development Act of 1986 to provide for Federal cost-sharing of water projects, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 7/26/1988--Introduced. Amends the Water Resources Development Act of 1986 to change the non-Federal share of costs for municipal water supply for flood control projects from 100 percent to 50 percent.
